Text: 山越人乃是部落民族，比較不習慣定居在漢人奢侈委靡的城邑中，而習慣在野外紮營度日。雖然這支山地部族並非遊牧民族，但仍較倚重農牧。\\n\\n此族人在紮營地既可自給自足，也能有效準備兵力，應對北方持續加重的入侵威脅。
English: Being a tribal people, the Shanyue are unused to the urban and decadent cities of the Han and prefer a life in encamped in the wilderness. Although not nomadic, the hill tribes are nevertheless a more pastoral, agricultural peoples. \\n\\n From their camps, they can both tend to their needs as a people and prepare themselves, militarily, for the ever-present and increasing threat of invasion from the North.
Vanilla: 山越人乃是部落民族，比較不習慣定居在漢人奢侈委靡的城邑中，而習慣在野外紮營度日。雖然這支山地部族並非遊牧民族，但仍較倚重農牧。\\n\\n此族人在紮營地既可自給自足，也能有效準備兵力，應對北方持續加重的入侵威脅。
PikaMan: 山越人乃是部落民族，比較不習慣定居在漢人奢侈委靡的城邑中，而習慣在野外紮營度日。雖然這支山地部族並非遊牧民族，但仍較倚重農牧。\\n\\n此族人在紮營地既可自給自足，也能有效準備兵力，應對北方持續加重的入侵威脅。

Text: 江南一帶長久以來一直是山越之民的故鄉，他們對這片土地懷有深厚的感情。如今野心勃勃的諸侯們要蠶食他們祖輩所居之地，他們必須拿起武器，以奮戰保衛故土。\\n\\n山越之民比漢人更熟悉江南的丘陵地形，他們將自己的堡壘建立在羣山中最險要的地方。他們可以在遠離天災人禍的地方安居樂業。
English: The Southlands have long been the home of the Shanyue tribes, and it is their ardent hope that it always will be. This is the truth by which they live, and one they must fight to protect as warlords begin to encroach. \\n\\n The Shanyue know the hills of the South better than any, and amidst the striking scenery, their fortresses rise: places to live and grow, away from both the extremities of the elements and the eyes of the enemy.
PikaMan: 江南一直都是山越族人的家園，他們也希望今後維持不變。這便是他們生存意義所在的真理，也是在諸侯割據的時代，他們必須奮戰保護的傳統。\\n\\n山越人比誰都瞭解南方的山區，並在這嶙峋之地建起了堡壘城寨；這裡遠離殘酷的風雨、也遠離敵人的監視，是他們生活成長之地。

Text: 「此處乃我等地盤、我等家園、我等基業。斷不能讓你們奪走！」
English: This is our land, our home, our history. You cannot have it!
Vanilla: 「此處乃我等地盤、我等家園、我等基業。斷不能讓你們奪走！」
PikaMan: 「此處乃我等地盤、我等家園、我等基業。斷不能讓你們奪走！」

Vanilla: 雖然山越人不得不建起柵欄保護自己，但其實他們只想和平度日。

Text: 你拒絕交出王允。反賊大怒，縱兵四處劫掠。

Text: 王允自行降於李郭。\\n\\n王允奏曰：“臣本為社稷計。事至此，陛下不惜已臣，以誤國家。臣請下見二賊。”
English: Wang Yun went to them obediently and left these words.\\n\\n "It was my wish to make the country peaceful. I didn't, so I sacrifice myself. The litte emperor has shown kindness to me, and I can't stand to live a miserable life."

Text: 你聽從荀彧的諫言，立志輔佐漢室。
English: Instead of sending Xun Yu the "gift", you chose to admit your wrong. With him, you swore to take the right path.
MappedByText: 你聽從荀彧的諫言，立志輔佐漢室。

Text: 荀彧見到了空食盒，明白了你的意思，於是服毒自盡。你聽到消息，懊悔不已，但爲時已晚。
English: Xun Yu recognized the meaning of your "gift" and made the last choice. You regretted your choice when you heard that he was dead, but it was too late.
MappedByText: 荀彧見到了空食盒，明白了你的意思，於是服毒自盡。你聽到消息，懊悔不已，但爲時已晚。

Text: 你派出特使重金將蔡琰贖回，但當她離開她的孩子們時，面容全無光彩。
English: You send an envoy to deliver the price in gold and bring Cai Yan back, but her face does not shine brightly as she leaves her children behind.

Text: 你決定將國庫的資金用於更有用的地方，但卻愧對了蔡氏家族。
English: Liu Bao's demands are outrageous and your coffers are better emptied elsewhere. The last of Cai Yong's line remains amongst the Xiongnu.

Text: 當世大儒蔡邕死於了王允的令下
English: Despite being a renowned scholar, Cai Yong was executed. Compromised men could not be allowed to further stifle the Han's flame.\\n\\n
Wang Yun's order was stayed. The renowned scholar would record the history of the Han as recompense for his wrongdoing.

Text: 關羽雖怒，卻不怒不變容，他令其女兒自行打掃狼藉，讓她自己反思。
English: Guan Yu's face, which seems to have nothing to turn redder, burned redder. But rather than getting angry, he's not gonna know what she did wrong.\\nhe wanted Yinping to feel it for herself.  So Guan Yu instructed Guan Yinping to take care of the mess herself.

Text: 關羽見一片狼藉，喚來其女，與她一同修復書櫥，並對其悉心教導。
English: Dozens of books scattered and walked into the mess, and Guan Yu quietly pursuaded Guan Yinping, who was crying. After crying for a long time in father's arms, Guan Yu soothed his daughter and cleaned up the room little by little and started repairing the bookshelf.

Text: 心愛的酒水被奪走了，銘心張飛大怒，欲讓其女對此事刻骨銘心。於是對張氏大聲斥罵，罵聲震耳欲聾，如同雷鳴。不料張氏卻頂撞其父，斥其父成日醉酒，總有一日會壞大事。
English: Blood boiling in anger, Zhang Fei called his daughter over and shouted at her, his booming voice like thunder. She had drank his precious wine, after all, and a lesson must be taught. However, the ever-defiant Zhang Xueer would not sit in silence - she scolded her father for drinking too much and said she didn’t care if he was upset!

Text: 儘管心愛的酒水被女兒喝得一乾二淨，張飛忍住了心中的不甘以及怒火，對張氏警告了私自觸碰他人物品的品行，以及對她說以後應當邀請他一起飲酒。
English: Despite being extremely agitated that Zhang Xueer had drank his favorite wine, Zhang Fei held back his rage. He explained that wine of such quality was hard to come by and, if she ever felt the need to try his wine again, that she better invite him to drink, too!

Text: 你帶著隨從，攀上高山舉辦祭典。夜晚來臨，你發現金星比之前見到時更加明亮了。次日，你從細作口中得知，一位名叫趙嫗的女中豪傑加入了某個派系，活躍於南方。
English: You, along with a few attendants, climbed a mountain and held the ceremony. That night, the golden star seemed to shimmer even more brilliantly than before. A few weeks later, you receive a letter from an old friend informing you that a woman named Lady Trieu has joined forces with another faction and has been active near the Southern Coast.

Text: 你漸漸的忘記了此事，豈能讓一個夢耽誤了你的霸業？
English: It was nothing more than a dream and you decide to let the memory fade away.

Text: 交戰雙方雙雙接受邀請前來赴宴，你向他們解釋了邀請雙方的原因以及依從天意的提議。袁劉兩家都接受了你的提議，並在驚歎中目睹了箭矢穿過了一百五十步外戟上的小支。
English: The opposing generals gathered at your encampment for a feast. You explained your proposal. Both parties agreed to your terms and watched in total awe as the arrow slices the plume free from one hundred fifty paces.

Text: 袁劉兩家相爭，與你毫無相干。你深知與其插手其中，不如令鶴蚌相爭，最後還可以方漁翁得利。
English: It’s of no concern to you if they want war.

Text: 雙方都接受了呂布的提議，並在驚歎中目睹了呂布在一百五十步外射中了戟上的小支。
English: Both parties agreed to Lü Bu’s terms and watched in total awe as his arrow slices the plume free from one hundred fifty paces.

Text: 呂布生性狡猾，此舉必然有詐。你謝過了呂布的宴席，回營深思退敵之計。
English: Lü Bu is the Warrior Without Equal, but he does not dictate our diplomatic policy. You bid the host thanks and take your leave.
Trusted men are needed in these times and you trusted none more than Jian Yong. He would serve you well as a trusted advisor

Text: 「我志雖大，但卻前途兇險，你還有家事老小，還是以他們爲重爲好。」\\n\\n 你將簡雍送回了他的住處。
English: You could not drag your good friend into harm’s way, instead, choosing to send him back to his hometown.

Text: 你派出特使重金將蔡琰贖回，然而如此的特殊待遇難免令他人產生妒忌之心。
English: You could not allow the last of the talented Cai Yong's children to be taken hostage, but the others are unhappy about the special treatment.

Text: 你無視了那名軍士，繼續派兵鎮壓匈奴入侵。
English: You refused to pay the barbarian for his atrocities against you and your people. Many were captured - how could you put her above them all?

Text: 你將大喬納爲妾室，你與她鸞鳳和鳴。
English: You made Da Qiao your concubine - you joined together in perfect unison.

Text: 你遣人把大喬從府中送了出去
你將貂蟬納爲妾室，絕世佳人怎可不爲龍所有？
English: You made Diaochan your concubine - such a legendary beauty must be yours.

Text: 你遣人把貂蟬從府中送了出去
你將何皇后納爲妾室，她將侍奉又一位君王。
English: You made Empress He your concubine - an Emperor she shall serve again.

Text: 你遣人把何皇后從府中送了出去
你將祝關嫣納爲妾室 ，只有持龍虎之志才配此女。
English: You made Guan Yinping your concubine - men doggedly pursued her, but only you proved worthy.

Text: 你遣人把關嫣從府中送了出去
你將卞氏納爲妾室， 怒不變容，喜不失節，故是最爲難。
English: You made Lady Bian your concubine - her qualities are those of a great Empress.

Text: 你遣人把卞氏從府中送了出去
你將蔡琰納爲妾室，她的文采將讓你的傳奇將流芳百世。
English: You made Cai Yan your concubine - your tales would be intertwined.

Text: 你遣人把蔡琰從府中送了出去
你將董氏納爲妾室，爲了保證你能坐上皇位她將傾其所有。
English: You made Dong Peishan your concubine - she would do any deed to ensure your rise.

Text: 你遣人把董氏從府中送了出去
你將劉氏納爲妾室，她的美貌激動人心。
English: You made Lady Du your concubine - her beauty was breathtaking.

Text: 你遣人把劉氏從府中送了出去
你將馮氏納爲妾室，在你的羽翼之下她將不再哭泣。
English: You made Lady Feng your concubine - with your protection, she will flourish and grow.

Text: 你遣人把馮氏從府中送了出去
你將糜氏納爲妾室，得此賢惠美貌之妻真是三生有幸。
English: You made Lady Mi your concubine - you always need more honest and devoted people around you.

Text: 你將陸政納爲妾室，你不僅收穫了一位可靠的謀士，還多了一員勇猛的將領
English: You made Lu Zheng your concubine - a boost to both your court and your armies.

Text: 你遣人把陸政從府中送了出去
你將華氏納爲妾室，面對如此神射卻是你先張弓搭箭。
English: You made Hua Lanli your concubine - it is you who pulled the strings this time.

Text: 你遣人把華氏從府中送了出去
你將馬雲祿納爲妾室，此女猶如婦好再世。
English: You made Ma Yunlu your concubine - quite possibly the second coming of Lady Fu Hao.

Text: 你遣人把馬雲祿從府中送了出去
你遣人把糜氏從府中送了出去
你將孫仁納爲妾室，她會將她的滿腔熱血注入到你的霸業當中。
English: You made Sun Ren your concubine - her fire and passion would forever be in your blood.

Text: 你遣人把孫仁從府中送了出去
你將趙嫗納爲妾室，傳說她乳長三尺，如今一見果然如此。
English: You made Lady Trieu your wife - her strength and spirit is indomitable!

Text: 你遣人把趙嫗從府中送了出去
你將伊健麗婷爲妾室，她將爲你的江山霸業鼎力相助。
English: You made Yijian Liting your concubine - she would assist you in seeking your own ambitions.

Text: 你遣人把伊健麗婷從府中送了出去
你將吳氏納爲妾室，她的剛正與氣概將助你一臂之力。
English: You made Lady Wu your concubine - her strength and grace alone could bind a faction together.

Text: 你遣人把吳氏從府中送了出去
你將袁氏納爲妾室，她的姓氏將爲你的霸業添上濃厚的一筆。
English: You made Lady Yuan Anyang your concubine - she could be as formidable as her family name.

Text: 你遣人把袁氏從府中送了出去
你將甄氏納爲妾室，此真孝婦也。
English: You made Lady Zhen your concubine - a beauty coveted by all and you were no different.

Text: 你遣人把甄氏從府中送了出去
你將鄭姜納爲妾室，她如一股狂風一般難以阻擋。
English: You made Zheng Jiang your concubine - she’s an irresistible force who cannot be refused.

Text: 你遣人把鄭姜從府中送了出去
你將祝融夫人納爲妾室 ，今有火神侍奉必將令士氣大振。
English: You made Lady Zhurong your concubine - her fiery spirit could provide a much needed spark.

Text: 你遣人把祝融夫人從府中送了出去
你將呂姬納爲妾室，她的美貌可與她的武藝相媲美。
English: You made Lü Ji your concubine - peerless in pedigree, her strength could be infinite.

Text: 你遣人把呂姬從府中送了出去
你將侯氏納爲妾室，她在邊疆侍奉公孫瓚的經驗實爲可貴。
English: You made Hou Jinting your concubine - her experience from the empire’s edge will be invaluable.

Text: 你遣人把侯氏從府中送了出去
你將小喬納爲妾室，她的甜言蜜語如音樂般餘音繚繞。
English: You made Xiao Qiao your concubine - her consent was music to your ears.

Text: 你遣人把小喬從府中送了出去
你將祝張氏納爲妾室 ，此女有麟鳳之氣。
English: You made Zhang Xueer your concubine - truly an Empress in the making.

Text: 你遣人把張氏從府中送了出去
你將鄭蘭納爲妾室，從此總比多一個叛賊好些。
English: You made Zheng Lan your concubine - better with you than against.

Text: 你遣人把鄭蘭從府中送了出去
不應理睬這些煩人的佈道僧侶。
English: It's best to ignore these annoying preachers.

Text: 你派出特使重金將蔡琰贖回，但當她離開她的孩子們時，面容全無光彩。
English: You send an envoy to deliver the price in gold and bring Cai Yan back, but her face does not shine brightly as she leaves her children behind.

Text: 你決定將國庫的資金用於更有用的地方，但卻愧對了蔡氏家族。
English: Liu Bao's demands are outrageous and your coffers are better emptied elsewhere. The last of Cai Yong's line remains amongst the Xiongnu.
There is no sin against this innocent girl.
There is no sin against this innocent girl.

English: A self-defense sword that Jian Yong used to carry in his travels.

Text: 此弓僅配鷹覷鶻望之人。
English: It's small and light, but its power is enormous.

Text: 此弓就如飛隼一般，看似小巧，實則力大無窮。
English: The Falcon’s arrows soar through the sky much like the bird of prey it’s named after.

Text: 此弓鑄造的鑄造者與你同鄉，真是令人欣慰。

English: There existed no finer swordsmith than Ou Yezi, no greater sword than his Juque.
Mother’s Bow shall forever protect the daughter.

Text: 此矛猶如蝰蛇的毒牙一般致命。
English: As accurate and deadly as a viper’s strike.

Text: 銳利得發光，此戟不遜於方天畫戟。
English: A weapon befitting a warrior destined for great things.

Text: 吳主孫權有六劍，三曰辟邪。
English: Legend has it that the great swords forged by Ou Yezi protect the sword-handler.

Text: 此弓射出的箭矢疾如狂風，眨眼間就能破軍殺將。
English: The frigid North Wind brings with it the cold grip of death.

English: The sound of its arrow cutting through the air resembles the fierce winds of Taiyuan.

Text: 雛龍雖尚且稚嫩，卻也是龍。

English: Pang De is an unrelenting force, whose avowed enemies know they must face him sooner or later.
Vanilla: 龐德不知退讓為何物，敵人皆知總有一日須在沙場上與他一較高下。

Text: 淳于瓊氣節剛烈，曾被漢靈帝冊封爲西園八校尉之一。
English: Once, Chunyu Qiong was a colonel of the Emperor’s own army. He will regain that pride.
Dong Min understands the unwritten rules of politics - one can never possess too much power.

Text: 仲氏大將軍張勳號令三軍誰敢不從？
English: As the leading general of the Kingdom of Zhong, Zhang Xun commands the formidable army of the Yuan family.

Text: 「華歆清純德素，誠一時之俊偉也。」
English: A man of measured approach, but also a keen opportunist that does not let go by a chance to climb higher.

Text: 「祖宿狡猾，爲表腹心，出作爪牙，表之鴟張，以祖氣息。」
English: Famed for setting the ambush that killed Sun Jian, Huang Zu guards the Yangtze, lying in wait and striking at the most opportune moment.

Text: 簡雍擅於辯論、議事，但也閒暇自得，行爲不檢。
English: A childhood friend of Liu Bei, Jian Yong is carefree and informal, but also a superior orator.

Text: 她的優雅、决心和美貌使她受到當時所有英雄的垂涎。
English: Her elegance, determination, and beauty made her coveted by all the heroes of the age.
MappedByText: 她的優雅、决心和美貌使她受到當時所有英雄的垂涎。

Text: 「婉娩淑女，與士並列。至柔動剛，彤管煒節。」
English: She never gave up in life - her art and her will were passed on from generation to generation.

Text: 馮氏不僅天姿國色，還因胸懷大志而深受袁術寵愛。
English: Jealous of Lady Feng’s preferential treatment and beauty, the concubines have made her cry in front of Yuan Shu numerous times.

Text: 董卓遍封其宗族，董白尚未及笄，便被封爲渭陽君，在郿城東起壇。
English: At an early age, Dong Zhuo gave Dong Bai his land to her. For some reason, her personality and reputation are not very good, but no one has been treated recklessly because of Dong Zhuo who takes care of her.

Text: 董卓髮妻，卓封郿侯。不僅生性貪婪，且行事作風十分謹慎狡猾。
English: Dong Peishan is greedy, but ever cautious in her conduct. If it’s Dong Zhou you’re after, you must outwit the cunning Dong Peishan first.

Text: 公孫瓚常年征戰在外，侯氏依靠着她的賢明與機警守護着家族的未來。
English: The stakes are raised on the fringes of the empire; Hou Jinting’s keen senses and vigilance safeguard the future of her family.
A tiger does not father nor marry a dog. The Silver Treasure of the prideful Guan Yu is a tigress, and must be treated accordingly.

Text: 虎父無犬女，呂布之女不僅美豔，也是戰場豪傑。
English: Much is expected from the Warrior Without Equal’s daughter, but the ravishing Lü Ji fights with both the skill and ferocity to live up to the Lü name.

Text: 狡黠之徒，矢不虛發，乃魁首之腕。
English: She transforms the sound of her bow and movement of her troops into a violent and beautiful song and dance.

Text: 羌族女傑華氏精於騎射，武藝不在其夫之下。
English: Hua Lanli’s archery skills are outstanding - drawing comparisons to the ancient hero Hou Yi, the Lord Archer himself.

Text: 馬雲祿深知兵在精而不在多，爲了部隊執銳披堅她總是不惜血本。
English: Ma Yunlu selects only elite units of soldiers to fight alongside her. For these well-equipped and highly skilled troops, she spares no expense.
An untamable woman of the Trieu Dynasty who fights to see her people free.

Text: 伊健麗婷眼觀六路，耳聽八方，對她的敵人瞭如指掌。
English: Yijian Liting’s eyes never rest. She is always aware of her enemy’s movements.
No matter how brave the warrior, they cannot hope to match the power of her dignity and generosity.

Text: 仲氏公主袁氏的美貌與賢良人盡皆知。
English: The beauty and qualities of Yuan Anyang, a princess of the Kingdom of Zhong, are known throughout the land.

Text: 雖爲女賊，其鴻鵠之志卻比肩世間梟雄。
English: An ambitious woman, whose reasons to marry Zhang Yan are as mysterious as herself.

Text: 繼其父虎將之勇及其母之貌，唯有行帝王之道者方可駕馭此女。
English: Of energetic and bright personality, she inherited her mother’s feminine charms but her father’s resilience and constitution. With a tiger for a father, only an Emperor will be a worthy husband.

Text: 「吾爲夫人故，特納張繡之降；不然滅族矣。」
English: Zou Yuan, the beauty everyone coveted, was widely known for her beauty. So many heroes wanted to keep her next to them at all costs. To the extent that Cao Cao lost his son and his general during the secret meeting with her at night.

Text: 「施壓於民，絕無益處。水能載舟，亦能覆舟。」
English: There is nothing to be gained from oppressing the people; they, ultimately, will decide our legacy.

Text: 只有一隻眼睛都可以如此爲非作歹，難道還需要另外一隻不成？
English: When your eye for banditry and mischief is this good, you don’t need both eyes.
Although he lost one hand, he was one of the few who survived from duel with Lubu.

Text: 閻象深圖遠慮，總是危機到來之前就做好了準備。

Inheriting his father’s spirit and ferocity, Zhang Bao revels in the rush of the battlefield, again and again proving himself to be worthy of his father’s legacy.

Text: 「二逆不誅，亂臣賊子，行將接踵於天下矣！」
English: Thirsting for vengeance, she rebelled against the Bandit Queen.

Text: 「昔周自後稷至於文王，積德累功，三分天下有其二，猶服事殷。明公雖奕世克昌，未若有周之盛，漢室雖微，未若殷紂之暴也。」
English: Yan Xiang’s calculated and prudent counsel prevails again and again.

Text: 陸政的獵物對她來說猶如甕中捉鱉。

Text: 我視你爲友，你竟然因一片黃金而與我割席而坐。
English: “Hurry, drink this panacea and all your troubles will slip away.”

Text: 陸政使用長弓手到擒來，總能先人一步拉弓搭箭。
English: Lu Zheng’s steady and skilled hands know how to strike quickly.

Text: 將士寧可上陣出生入死，也不肯在營中被將軍責罵。

Text: 爲國者以民爲基，民以衣食爲本。
English: One cannot save one’s friends from impending disaster if they do not listen.

Text: 棲身與暴君鸇狼身旁，董白已練就金剛不壞之身。

Text: 荀彧堅定不移的意志是將士之範。
English: Xun Yu’s firm and unbroken will is an example to all soldiers.

Text: 敵軍勢窮，怎可不乘勝追擊？

Text: 有傳言說有一人可以徒手馴服一頭暴怒的公牛。

Text: 即將舉行的皇家祭祀儀式是朝中的一項重大活動。詔書要求您派文官去協助行政事務，或派武官去協助禁衛。如果您盡忠職守，朝廷會給予賞賜。拒不執行，則可能招致天子的不滿。
English: The imperial ancestral rite, a significant event in China, will be held soon. An imperial decree demands that you send civil officials to assist in administrative affairs or military officers for the imperial guard detail. If you fulfill your duties as a faithful servant, the imperial court will grant you grace. If you refuse, you may incurr the emperor's disfavour...
MappedByText: 即將舉行的皇家祭祀儀式是朝中的一項重大活動。詔書要求您派文官去協助行政事務，或派武官去協助禁衛。如果您盡忠職守，朝廷會給予賞賜。拒不執行，則可能招致天子的不滿。

Text: 朝廷下達了一道詔書，將在皇宮設宴邀請天下有影響力的貴族。这恐怕是輔政大臣因爲擔心我們的影響力設下的计谋，但违背诏书可能會有嚴重後果……
English: A decree has arrived from the imperial court. A banquet is to be held, and influential nobles from across China are invited to the imperial palace. Wary of our influence, the imperial protector may be plotting something. However, refusing an imperial decree may have grave consequences...
MappedByText: 朝廷下達了一道詔書，將在皇宮設宴邀請天下有影響力的貴族。这恐怕是輔政大臣因爲擔心我們的影響力設下的计谋，但违背诏书可能會有嚴重後果……

Text: 李傕、郭汜帶著大軍殺到長安，要為死去的主公報仇，不取仇家的首級誓言不罷休。
English: Li Jue and Guo Si came to the capital with a huge army. They want avenge for their fallen master. The only thing they want is the neck of the killer.
MappedByText: 李傕、郭汜帶著大軍殺到長安，要為死去的主公報仇，不取仇家的首級誓言不罷休。

Text: 您之所以憤怒，是因為您發現您的心腹荀彧有了異心。雖然他沒有公開反對您，您相信他一有機會便会反叛。\\n\\n您可以送他一個空食盒。他看到後就會明白您的意思。
English: You are furious because you found out your old friend and trusted servant, Xun Yu, has turned his back against you. He does not oppose you publicly for the time being, but you are certain he will betray you the first chance he gets. \\n\\n It's time to choose. You can send him a "gift." when he receives your "gift," he who shares a deep friendship with you will know the meaning of it...
MappedByText: 您之所以憤怒，是因為您發現您的心腹荀彧有了異心。雖然他沒有公開反對您，您相信他一有機會便会反叛。\\n\\n您可以送他一個空食盒。他看到後就會明白您的意思。

Text: 蔡邕身爲當代大儒，卻無男性繼承人，唯育一女蔡文姬卻爲匈奴左賢王所擄。\\n\\n 今蔡氏血脈能否延續，由你決定。
English: Cai Yong was a well-known scholar, but had no male heir. Cai Yan, his only daughter, has become a concubine of the Southern Xiongnu's Liu Bao. If the Cai lineage is to endure, she cannot remain there. Even though she has two children with Liu Bao, we can't afford to lose the last member of the Cai clan.\\n\\nThe price will be steep to purchase such a precious jewel ...

Text: 董卓被殺，蔡邕傷感其遇，被王允知悉，而出兵捉拿蔡邕並下令處死。\\n\\n 王允曰：「昔武帝不殺司馬遷，使作謗書，流於後世。方今國祚中衰，戎馬在郊，不可令佞臣執筆在幼主左右，後令吾徒並受謗議。」
English: After Dong Zhou's death, it was observed that the noted scholar Cai Yong mourned his passing. Upon hearing this, Wang Yun immediately sent troops to capture Cai Yong and ordered for his execution.\\n\\n "Cai Yong mourned as the tyrant lie dead! It's clear that his loyalty lied with Dong Zhou! Treason!" exclaimed Wang Yun, madness in his eyes.

Text: 關嫣在倦與詩書之時拾起其父親的青龍偃月刀，想效仿其父過五關斬六將之勇，不料卻不小心砍壞了關羽的書櫥。關羽聞聲趕來，見此狼藉心中顧慮重重。
English: Guan Yinping tried to swing her father's Green Dragon Crescent Blade secretly, but accidentally broke the bookshelf that her father had cherished. Guan Yu came into the room late at night to read a book and found this ridiculous situation. Guan Yu was worried about how to talk.

Text: 趁父親外出練武之時，張氏在倦與詩書之時竟拾起其父之酒壺，偷偷飲酒。張飛歸來之時發現自己的酒壺居然一滴不剩，馬上知道發生了什麼，開始尋找自己的女兒。
English: One evening, with her father Zhang Fei away at a council meeting, Zhang Xueer decided, mostly due to boredom, to drink some of her father’s favorite wine. When Zhang Fei returned in the morning, thirsty from his travels, he found nothing but bone dry wine jugs! Gone to the very last drop! Immediately knowing the culprit, he stormed out of his room in search of his daughter.

Text: 月明星稀，你在漫步於後院苦思於謀策之時發現了夜空中閃耀着一顆明亮的金星。當晚就寢時，一位先知現於夢中，說如若舉行祭天大典你便可改變歷史。次日，這想法充斥着你的腦海。雖是場夢，但卻如此生動，常現在腦海中揮之不去。
English: On a late stroll through the courtyard, you saw a uniquely golden star - its twinkle pulsed as if it was the very heartbeat of the night sky. Later that evening as you slept, a prophet appeared in your dream and said that if you held a ceremony to heaven, you could alter history. The next day your thoughts are consumed by it. You thought it merely a dream, yet it was so vivid and lives on in your mind.

Text: 不出所料，袁劉兩家果然開戰了。出於本方的利益，你與你的謀士參議，決定邀請兩家來到營中，並嘗試講和。
English: At no surprise to many, war has been declared between Yuan Shu and Liu Bei. At your next court meeting, your strategists and advisors debate whether their war is a blessing or a curse for your faction. One advisor, opposed to the war, puts forths that you invite generals from both factions to a feast and suggest they abide by Heaven’s command - by means of you attempting an extraordinary, if not impossible feat of shooting the plume off your halberd from a great distance. If the shot is successful, they must make peace.

Text: 大戰將至，呂布派來的使節卻突然來訪，邀請你去參加他設下的宴席。雖然可疑，但你相信你們昔日的舊情於是前往赴宴。你在到達後卻發現敵軍大將紀靈也在席上，呂布解釋道他平生痛恨爭鬥，希望此次爭鬥能依天意而行。他提議如果他能射中營中一百五十步外戟上的小支，雙方就必須停戰。
English: On the eve of battle, you receive a message from Lü Bu inviting you to his camp for a feast. Although wary, you choose to attend. You are surprised to find an enemy general there as well. Lü Bu explains that he wishes to see peace between your factions and proposes a test to determine Heaven’s will. If he can shoot the plume off his halberd with an arrow, you must make peace with your enemy. You carefully consider his proposal ...

Text: 老友簡雍在聽聞你的雄心壯志後前來拜訪。你與他促膝長談，期間他透露希望與你共謀大事。
English: After hearing of Liu Bei's departure and intent on fighting the Yellow Turban Rebellion, his close childhood friend Jian Yong arrived with intent to join him. A long conversation was had about life and the state of the country, but the time for talk is quickly coming to a close. War looms on the horizon and your friend desires to join you.

Text: 匈奴入侵，凡經過之處皆寸草不生。亂軍之中一名軍士來報：蔡邕的女兒，蔡文姬，被匈奴人俘走了。
English: A surprise invasion is launched by the Xiongnu and the city is devastated. Many are wounded or captured during the assault. One of your military advisors informs you that Cai Yong's daughter, the last of his line, Cai Yan is among those captured by the barbarians. The Xiongnu chanyu Liu Bao has placed a sizeable ransom price on her head.\\n

Text: 曹操曾在修建銅雀臺時寫過欲延攬二喬之詩句，今得二喬之一，你感嘆大喬果然是傾國美人。你開始思考是否納她爲妾。
English: Da Qiao, the elder of the Two Qiaos of Jiangdong, a famous beauty and skilled musician, has come to your faction. You know of her skill as a musician and ask her to sing for you. Her soothing tones wash over you and you cannot help, but consider making her your concubine.

Text: 猛將勇夫不能除一董卓，而貂蟬獨能除之。你不僅被貂蟬的美貌所折服，更被其膽識所吸引，於是考慮向其傳達納妾之意。
English: Diaochan, a deadly beauty and a most beautiful woman who shook the hearts of countless men, has joined our faction. You rush out to greet her and, then at night, secretly call to her. She recalled the tyrant Dong Zhou, asking where your ambitions lie and of your true intentions to do justice. After all this, you contemplate making this beauty your concubine.

Text: 聽說國母何後傾國傾城；母儀天下，如今親眼所見真是五體投地！你仔細思考將何皇后納爲妾室的利與弊。
English: On an ordinary day, you receive a letter - it’s from the presumably deceased, but truly hidden Empress He! An envoy and small, trusted guard are sent to retrieve her. Upon arrival, despite her non-descript attire, she presents the powerful and dignified aura that made her a peerless politico. Your mind calculates what she could offer your ambitions, or if her presence could bring more harm than good.

Text: 都說虎女焉能嫁犬子，如今你圖謀大事，有帝王之志，定能配得上此等女傑。你考慮與此女結下姻緣。
English: Guan Yinping, the precious daughter of peerless Guan Yu, now calls our faction home. Her charm is undeniable, but the apple did not fall far from the tree in the matters of the battlefield, she’s both stoic beauty and a force to be reckoned with. Thus, it’s no surprise that men across the realm desperately seek her hand, but few had the courage or fitting status to dare to approach her legendary father. As for you ...

Text: 怒不變容，喜不失節，故是最爲難。卞氏的氣概令你折服，你與卞氏長談後苦思是否納她爲妾之事。
English: Lady Bian, a concubine-turned-wife of Cao Cao, has been persuaded to join us. She is known throughout the realm as being unflappable amidst the chaos, dignified, and a shrewd diplomat. She has ascended since birth, not nefariously, but by unwavering character.  It is said that behind every powerful man is a powerful lady. Perhaps ...

Text: 蔡琰的才華可謂千古難逢，此女不僅有才，且還美豔動人。你在府中吟誦蔡妍所著的詩詞，其意深遠脫俗，你也陷入了苦思之中。
English: Cai Yan, daughter of the famous calligraphist Cai Yong, has moved to your capital. The additional scholarly presence was warmly welcomed and, to express her gratitude for your hospitality, she composed a poem for you - a masterpiece of utmost eloquence. You, being so enamored by her written word, could not help, but want to join her lines with yours.

Text: 董賊原配，沒想到如此足智多謀。你在見過董氏之後考慮將她納爲妾室。
English: The tyrant’s wife, Dong Peishan, has entered your court. Though she clearly possesses cruel tendencies, you can see the cunning intellectual and adept politician beneath. Enamored by her maturity and political talents, you contemplate what her addition as a concubine could provide. Upon presenting her troves of silks and jewels, you perceive her thoughts may perfectly align with yours.

Text: 劉氏猶如明珠一般美麗動人，如此美貌怎可錯過？你有意將劉氏納爲妾室。
English: A treasure came to us! Lady Du, considered one of the true beauties in all of China, has joined our court! It is known that each and every hero, warlord, and royal longed to make her theirs. You find yourself drawn to her like a moth to the flame and, after spending a great deal of time in her company and in self-contemplation, you must choose if you could see her with another.

Text: 如此美人，怎可讓其日夜哭泣？你考慮將馮氏納爲妾室。
English: We must truly have Heaven’s approval. Treated poorly by Yuan Shu’s concubines, Lady Feng has been driven into our waiting arms. She has served powerful lords, but, more importantly, she’s known to be pure-hearted and of great benevolence. Her presence alone seems to boost the spirits of the court and the public alike. Treat her well, pamper her and surely you will see the favor returned.

Text: 你夜訪陸政，作爲魁首的左膀右臂陸鄭同樣見多識廣，且深藏不露。你細思是否將她納爲妾室。
English: Lu Zheng, the chief strategist and confidant to the Bandit Queen Zheng Jiang, comes under your employ. Her brilliance in military affairs is matched only by her considerable skill with a bow. You spend an evening together with a robust wine and fulfilling conversation. Her mind is as sharp as her approach is pointed. You must notch and fire this one like an arrow from her Wind of Taiyuan bow; without question, your foes will be cut down before you.

Text: 聽聞華氏武藝高強，常年征戰西羌。此次相會，你見華氏雖然歷經風霜但卻美麗動人。你立馬開始思考是否納她爲妾。
English: Hua Lanli, renowned for her archery skill, joined the faction. Like many warrior women of Liang Province, her face and hands are a bit rough, but fetching and formidable all the same. You gift to her several fine silk garments, rare gems, and provide exquisite meals. In your mind, the designs to make her your concubine have already taken flight like an arrow from her Goshawk bow.

Text: 你與馬雲祿徹夜長談軍武，讚揚她的經歷所聞。回府期間，你考慮是否傳達納妾之意。
English: Ma Yunlu, kin to a myriad of heroic warriors, has come to join your ranks. She had been raised by a strong mother and watched her magnificent brother Ma Chao’s every move - the lessons had clearly served her well. You invited her on a horseback ride and were enthralled by her prowess on horse and her strong presence. You imagined the brood she would produce with you, and the blood she would spill for you.

Text: 糜氏不僅賢惠美麗，她還是徐州大家糜氏的一員，如納她爲妾可謂一石二鳥。於是你爲掂量此事閉門不出。
English: Our faction grows stronger! Lady Mi, of the wealthy and influential Mi clan, has joined us. Her family faithfully served Tao Qian for many years. She’s said to be a modest and loyal companion who is a boon to have at your side. The more thought you give to adding the daughter of a powerful Xuzhou family to your harem, the more enticing it seems.

Text: 孫仁桀驁不馴的個性與出色的樣貌深深的折服了你，於是你考慮決定將她納爲妾室。
English: Sun Ren, born to a family of heroes and the daughter of legendary general Sun Jian, has joined your cause. Her prowess in martial combat is worthy of the name Sun. You meet the wildfire Lady Sun, flanked by a dozen of her personal handmaiden guard, in the courtyard. Her radiant beauty, strength, and intensity capture your imagination, giving thought to brighter days with Lady Sun as your concubine.

Text: 傳說趙嫗身長9尺，胸長達3尺，作戰時將其胸綁在背上，身穿盔甲，頭插金簪，腳穿象牙鞋，騎在象頭上衝鋒陷陣。得知有此奇女，你仔細斟酌是否傳達納妾之意。
English: What a sight to behold! Lady Trieu, on the back of a rare, white elephant, enters through your gates escorted by a convoy. After much consideration, she has chosen to join your faction. It’s a great victory to add a woman of such strength, spirit, and conviction. You ask Lady Trieu for her hand in marriage, but are quickly rebuffed. One night, after a feast, Lady Trieu approaches you and accepts your proposal. Together, you could drive out the imposters and conquer the country.

Text: 此女城府極深，且武藝高強。你在與伊健麗婷長談後考慮納她爲妾。
English: Wang Kuang’s spouse, Yijian Liting, has found her way to us. She’s as renowned for her courage in combat as she is her perseverance. As you share private moments with her, you find her desire to excel in all aspects of life to be admirable. Women, true of heart and ambitious, must be appreciated. Perhaps, she would be a fine concubine - making capable sons and daughters.

Text: 虎之妻，何不爲龍之妻？你考慮將吳氏納爲妾室。
English: A letter was sent to Lady Wu of the famous Wu family in Jiangdong - no words, only a drawing of a dying tiger. Soon after, she came to visit you secretly and you brought her into your faction. Your time together reaffirms what’s said about Lady Wu - a practical approach and a devotion to her loved ones. You wonder if your family could be the benefactor of her piety.

Text: 袁氏爲袁氏後代，不僅美貌絕人而且政治經驗頗豐。於是你考慮遣人傳達納妾之意。
English: Lady Yuan Anyang, the elegant and eldest daughter of Yuan Shu, has joined us. All across China, young nobles desired to have her hand in marriage as the Yuan’s have held the highest government offices for four generations. These family traits seemed to have passed down - her adeptness at state affairs is truly remarkable! Such a youthful talent should not go to waste ...

Text: 此女貴乃不可言，你考慮將甄氏納爲妾室。
English: Fortune has smiled upon us today! Long have you heard the rumors of a maiden hailing from Hebei, enchanting in both appearance and nature. Now, this Lady Zhen has come to join our worthy cause. Rarely are rumors more than partial truth, but even the rumors did not do Lady Zhen justice. Fate has brought you together and, by your own will, you can ensure that it remains so.

Text: 你隻身探訪鄭姜，此前認爲她僅僅爲狗盜之輩，而當今卻被她的氣魄與見識所折服，於是你仔細斟酌納妾之事。
English: The Bandit Queen named Zheng Jiang joined your forces. A Taiyuan woman, infamous for her ferocity and skill, she carried a pair of well-crafted axes called the “Red Sisters”. Your welcome, a banquet with much wine, soon turned to sport as the Bandit Queen desired combat. Her martial display ended with two of your defeated bodyguards and much excitement. Perhaps, gold and glory would be ample trade to make her unending skill and free spirit yours.

Text: 祝融夫人作爲一名南蠻戰士，果然名不虛傳，然而令人驚訝的是她純潔與堅定的內心。你考慮在次日遣人傳達納妾之意。
English: When Lady Zhurong joined our faction, many were interested to see the mighty Nanman warrior - including yourself. She did not disappoint. Her well-known spirit, unfiltered and unwavering, was apparent whether it be in court or combat. A union with the Nanman, with the beautiful Lady Zhurong could ignite your unstoppable spread across China, or, perhaps, come to burn your faction.

Text: 飛將之女呂姬武藝不在其父之下，如能得此猛將霸業必成！你考慮在次日遣人傳達納妾之意。
English: Lü Ji, daughter of the “Warrior Without Equal” Lü Bu, has pledged her Starseeker Halberd to our cause! As the days pass in court and on the battlefield, her passion for combat and deep drive to be greatest is obvious. A Lü turned the world upside down once before, why not again. With a weapon like her in your hand, all you must do is point it toward your foes and see your own ambitions realized.

Text: 侯氏賢明機警，在公孫瓚常年征戰在外的情況下總能穩定後防。你在瞭解了侯氏的才能後有意納她爲妾。
English: Hou Jinting, matriarch of Gongsun Zan’s family, has joined us. It takes an intelligent and hardy woman to survive at the far reaches of the empire - Huo Jinting is no exception. She’s known for a sharp political mind and a guiding hand in civil affairs. In her time at court, you find her to be quite insightful. A woman like this could be useful in the turbulent times that lie ahead.

Text: 曹操曾在修建銅雀臺時寫過欲延攬二喬之詩句，今得二喬之一，你感嘆小喬果然是傾國美人。你開始思考是否納她爲妾。
English: Xiao Qiao, the younger of the Two Qiaos of Jiangdong, a famous beauty and skillful musician, has joined your faction. You recall hearing of her adeptness with a zither and ask her to play for you. She plucks at the strings of her zither and your heart alike and, when she is finished, you relax in your seat and contemplate making her your concubine.

Text: 很難想象此等花顏月貌竟能在沙場上威震四方，還能在官場上舌戰羣儒。你在瞭解了張氏的才能後考慮納她爲妾。
English: Zhang Xueer, the daughter of the wild Zhang Fei, has joined our faction. Upon meeting the young maiden, it was difficult to fathom that such a vision could be the offspring of the acclaimed general known for drinking excessively and flying into an uncontrollable rage. Soon, however, you could see her father through those feminine charms - the defiance in her voice or the courage to take on any task, no matter the difficulty or danger. And now, a choice of potential peril, the wrath of her legendary father and fierce brother, or, perhaps, endless reward.

Text: 此女曾爲黑山母主，一人之下，萬人之上。有此人相助，大業必成！你考慮在次日遣人傳達納妾之意。
English: The Queen of Black Mountain, once reigning atop the infamous mountains, has joined our cause and bent the knee to you! The elusive Zheng Lan rose quickly through the bandit ranks - a foot soldier one day and the ruler seemingly on the next. The most successful of hit-and-runs, but who would expect any less from this elusive and relentless Robber Queen? The real mystery is whether her apparent loyalty can be trusted and what, if any, steps you could take to truly earn it ...

Text: 從船上下來一群剃光頭的異人。他們自稱從遙遠地方來此傳播佛道。也許值得支持他們？
English: A group of unusual men sporting shaved heads disembark from a ship.  They claim to have journeyed from distant lands to spread the teachings of Buddha. Perhaps it will be worth supporting them?
MappedByText: 從船上下來一群剃光頭的異人。他們自稱從遙遠地方來此傳播佛道。也許值得支持他們？

Text: 蔡邕身爲當代大儒，卻無子嗣，唯育一女蔡文姬卻爲匈奴左賢王所擄。
English: Cai Yong was a well-known scholar, but had no male heir. Cai Yan, his only daughter, has become a concubine of the Southern Xiongnu's Liu Bao. If the Cai lineage is to endure, she cannot remain there. Even though she has two children with Liu Bao, we can't afford to lose the last member of the Cai clan.\\n\\nThe price will be steep to purchase such a precious jewel ...

Text: 前面來了一群乞丐，其中有一名衣冠楚楚的少女上前行禮。女孩自稱董白，是暴君董卓最後的親人。她求你帶她走。
English: A group of beggars appears before you. Among them, a girl dressed nicely comes forward and bows. The girl identifies herself as Dong Bai, the last kin of the tyrant Dong Zhuo, and begs you to take her.
MappedByText: 前面來了一群乞丐，其中有一名衣冠楚楚的少女上前行禮。女孩自稱董白，是暴君董卓最後的親人。她求你帶她走。

Text: 前面來了一群乞丐，其中有一名衣冠楚楚的少女上前行禮。女孩自稱董白，是暴君董卓最後的親人。她求你帶她走。
English: A group of beggars appears before you. Among them, a girl dressed nicely comes forward and bows. The girl identifies herself as Dong Bai, the last kin of the tyrant Dong Zhuo, and begs you to take her.
MappedByText: 前面來了一群乞丐，其中有一名衣冠楚楚的少女上前行禮。女孩自稱董白，是暴君董卓最後的親人。她求你帶她走。

Text: 經過數個世代，漢王朝失其天命。然而，天下黎民仍飽受各地宣稱帶有天命的軍閥，所帶來的戰亂之苦。主公，你必須終結亂世。天下正等待新的治理規則引導新的團結繁榮與太平盛​​世。你將如何選擇，治裏天下衆生？
English: After centuries, the old Han Dynasty has finally lost the Mandate of Heaven. Yet the people under heaven still suffer from the chaos of war brought by petty warlords and their false claims to the Mandate. My Lord, you must end this. China awaits a ruler who will bring unity and prosperity to the realm. How will you choose to rule the people of China?
PikaMan: 經過數個世代，漢王朝失其天命。然而，天下黎民仍飽受各地宣稱帶有天命的軍閥，所帶來的戰亂之苦。主公，您必須終結亂世。天下正等待新的治理規則引導新的團結繁榮與太平盛世。您將如何選擇，治裡天下眾生？

Text: 劉備一行人途經冀州關家莊，莊主關定見劉關張英雄蓋世而關羽又爲其同宗兄弟，欲使其次子關平與三人一同匡扶漢室，於是劉備主張關羽與關平爲義父子。
English: One day while Liu Bei and Guan Yu passed through Hebei, they stayed overnight at the home of a man named Guan Jing. Guan Jing treated Guan Yu and his party very kindly because they have same surname. Liu Bei suggested to adopt among his two sons, Guan Jing introduce second son named Ping...

Text: 一隻殘軍請求加入您的勢力。袁術戰敗後，其部將張勳，紀靈及閻象收攏潰卒。然而，接納他們可能會惹惱袁術之敵。
English: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Yuan Shu's defeat, his generals Zhang Xun, Ji Ling and Yan Xiang to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.
MappedByText: 一隻殘軍請求加入您的勢力。袁術戰敗後，其部將張勳，紀靈及閻象收攏潰卒。然而，接納他們可能會惹惱袁術之敵。

Text: 一隻殘軍請求加入您的勢力。呂布戰敗後，其女呂姬收攏潰卒。然而，接納他們可能會惹惱呂布之敵。
English: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Lu Bu's defeat, his daughter Lu Ji seems to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.
MappedByText: 一隻殘軍請求加入您的勢力。呂布戰敗後，其女呂姬收攏潰卒。然而，接納他們可能會惹惱呂布之敵。

Text: 天下大亂，雄豪並起。主公若能運籌演謀，鞭撻宇內，忠於漢室之能人必來投效。以公之神武明哲而輔以大順，何向而不濟！
English: None of the other warlords in China are as noble or accomplished as you are. Bring order to chaos and officers who were once loyal to the Han Dynasty will flock to your banner. Defeat your rivals and accumulate wealth to expand your power.
MappedByText: 天下大亂，雄豪並起。主公若能運籌演謀，鞭撻宇內，忠於漢室之能人必來投效。以公之神武明哲而輔以大順，何向而不濟！

Text: 的確，西域商人帶來的貨物種類繁多，其中不乏珍惜名貴之物。而且，護送他們的傭兵看起來就像是天生的戰士。
English: Indeed, the goods brought by the western merchants are diverse, with many rare and valuable items. Furthermore, the mercenaries escorting them look like natural warriors.
MappedByText: 的確，西域商人帶來的貨物種類繁多，其中不乏珍惜名貴之物。而且，護送他們的傭兵看起來就像是天生的戰士。

Text: 附近村莊有傳聞說，每晚會有巨獸出沒恐嚇農民。村民們在找尋一位英雄來進山驅走怪獸。
English: There's a rumor about a nearby village. Each night, a huge monster terrorises the peasants. The villagers seek a hero to comb the mountains and drive out the beast.
MappedByText: 附近村莊有傳聞說，每晚會有巨獸出沒恐嚇農民。村民們在找尋一位英雄來進山驅走怪獸。

Text: 在您與部下開始搜山幾天後，您遇到了一個不可思議的景象：一隻巨型白虎的巢穴。您的部下被老虎體型嚇到，懇求您回去。您感覺好像那隻巨大的老虎正在盯著你。
English: A few days after you and your men began searching the mountains, you come across an incredible sight. The den of a large white tiger and its family. The men are intimidated by its size and implore you to go back. You feel as if the massive tiger is staring at you.
MappedByText: 在您與部下開始搜山幾天後，您遇到了一個不可思議的景象：一隻巨型白虎的巢穴。您的部下被老虎體型嚇到，懇求您回去。您感覺好像那隻巨大的老虎正在盯著你。

Text: 隨着匪幫的擴張，衆將中難免會有人持不臣之心。其中朱土，朱崩二人野心勃勃，勢力日益壯大，準備推翻你。 \\n\\n 想要收復她們的忠誠，恐怕得花費不少金銀俸祿。
English: Two bandits came to you with a proposal. “If we work together, we can rid ourselves of that Zheng Jiang bitch.” They indeed possessed formidable presence and determination to back their confidence. They desire to overthrow the queen they once served.\\n\\n They offered their assistance, but not without a price. They will require compensation for their part.
Rebellion of Li Jue and Guo Si
Power and Poise Personified, Lady Bian
Archer of the West, Hua Lanli
Queen of Black Mountain, Zheng Lan
The Last Kin of the Dong Zhuo
The Last Kin of the Dong Zhuo
A New Era, A New Ruler.

Text: 李傕與郭汜把持朝政，天下大亂。
English: The chaos caused by Li Jue and Guo Si is devastating the whole country.
MappedByText: 李傕與郭汜把持朝政，天下大亂。

Text: 惡有惡報。種其因者,須食其果。
English: Using violence to settle personal scores only causes backlash from those around you.

Text: 錢財不拿來造福人民，卻用於贖買美色。此舉會使百姓不滿。
English: Special treatment draws the ire of those around you.

Text: 有仁有德之君必得人心。
English: In chaotic times, sometimes you must set personal feelings aside and treat them with kindness.

Text: 做事應該顧全大局，而不是唯利是圖。
English: It’s a good idea to not reveal your ambitions to the public.

Text: 由於鎮民和商人正向采用新貨幣，市場已陷入混亂。
English: The markets have been thrown into chaos as townsfolk and merchants scramble to adopt the new currency.
MappedByText: 由於鎮民和商人正向采用新貨幣，市場已陷入混亂。

Text: 駐軍會協助縣內行政事宜。
English: Garrisoned armies will support the administration of the local county.
MappedByText: 駐軍會協助縣內行政事宜。

English: A new regime is coming into power.

Text: 以軍隊的效率治理領地。
English: You rule your domain with military efficiency.
MappedByText: 以軍隊的效率治理領地。

English: We are reaping the benefits of military rule.

Text: 勉强能供應我們的騎兵。
English: We're barely keeping our cavalry supplied.
MappedByText: 勉强能供應我們的騎兵。

English: There's a sufficient number of horses.
There's no shortage of good horses.

Text: 戰馬的數量與質量皆無與倫比！
English: The quantity and quality of your warhorses is unmatched!
MappedByText: 戰馬的數量與質量皆無與倫比！

English: The fervour is now only left in the white ashes.
Ready to colour the world once again.
It will be different this time. Obviously...
It will be different this time. Obviously...
The Black Mountain bandits are scattered.

Text: 起家微薄亦可立業有成。
English: Though you started with little, you will end with much.
MappedByText: 起家微薄亦可立業有成。

English: With these numbers you can accomplish great things.
It's getting harder to find anyone who isn't a Black Mountain bandit.

Text: 此城人口匯聚，是各種商業和文化活動的中心，平民百姓和名門仕紳皆在此共存。
English: This city is a populous hive of activity, a centre of commerce and culture in which the lowest of commoners coexists with the mightiest of nobles.
Vanilla: 此城人口匯聚，是各種商業和文化活動的中心，平民百姓和名門仕紳皆在此共存。

Text: 此城熱鬧非凡，各行各業的居民汲汲營營於每日生計。
English: This city is bustling with activity, its diverse population living their lives and plying their trades day-to-day.
Vanilla: 此城熱鬧非凡，各行各業的居民汲汲營營於每日生計。

English: [[b]]Stratocracy[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] An inevitable rule to stabilize the turmoil. [[/col]]

Text: [[b]]堅韌[[/b]]是此派系的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]劉寵勇武過人，軍紀嚴明，使膽敢與大漢爲敵的人聞風喪膽。[[/col]][[/i]] \\n\\n
English: [[b]]Fortitude[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] With bravery and discipline, Liu Chong inspires his men and puts fear into the enemies of the imperial palace. [[/col]][[/i]] \\n\\n

Text: [[b]]駿馬[[/b]]是此派系的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]養育大宛馬來裝備騎兵部隊。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Horse Breeding[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] Ferghana horses are bred to equip cavalry forces. [[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]凝聚[[/b]]是此派系的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]黑山賊首乘亂以其凝聚力以增其匪幫之數。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Black Mountain[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] Black Mountain bandits exploit the chaos to bolster their numbers. [[/col]][[/i]]

Text: 皇帝不滿您的行徑，可能會出手制裁。
English: The emperor has been disappointed with your actions. He may choose to punish you.
Vanilla: 皇帝不滿您的行徑，可能會出手制裁。

Text: 皇帝滿意您的功績，可能會給予賞賜。
English: The emperor is proud of your achievements. He may choose to reward you.
Vanilla: 皇帝滿意您的功績，可能會給予賞賜。

Text: 消耗軍事物資以穩定佔領的據點。
English: Military supplies were consumed to stabilise the settlement.
PikaMan: 消耗軍事物資以穩定佔領的據點。

Text: 圍城成功後，我軍奪得了軍事物資補給。
English: These military supplies were pillaged after a successful siege.
Vanilla: 圍城成功後，我軍奪得了軍事物資補給。
PikaMan: 圍城成功後，我軍奪得了軍事物資補給。

Text: 沒人歡迎他們，所有人都反而質疑你的決定。
English: No one welcomes them, and everyone cast doubt to your decision.
MappedByText: 沒人歡迎他們，所有人都反而質疑你的決定。

Text: 呂布的隨從希望能迅速加入您麾下。我們可以考慮調兵的機會。
English: Lu Bu's retinues want to join us quickly. We may  focus on military redeployment.
MappedByText: 呂布的隨從希望能迅速加入您麾下。我們可以考慮調兵的機會。

Text: 呂布派系的餘黨加入了我方。
English: Remnants of Lu Bu's faction have joined us. We may focus on military redeployment.

Text: 與漢人的文化衝突導致了羌人部落的失控。百姓不安，質疑你的治理，爭相離去。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Qiang barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
PikaMan: 羌人部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: 分解帝國，以封地的形式分給各地諸侯，以霸治國。
English: ...dividing up the empire, parcelling it out in fiefs to the various kings and marquises, he was hailed as the mighty conqueror...
PikaMan: ...分解帝國，以封地的形式分給各地諸侯，他被譽為強大的征服者...

Text: 使人民能夠安居樂業與死得其所，無所紛爭，是爲王道政治的第一步。
English: Enabling the people to nourish their living and mourn their dead, without any feeling against any, is the first step of the rule of virtue.
PikaMan: 使人民能夠安居樂業與死得其所，無所紛爭，是為王道政治的第一步。

Text: 與漢人的文化衝突導致了烏桓部落的失控。百姓不安，質疑你的治理，爭相離去。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Shanyue barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
PikaMan: 山越部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: 强大的白虎與我們同在。
English: Powerful white tigers are with us.
MappedByText: 强大的白虎與我們同在。

Text: 與漢人的文化衝突導致了烏桓部落的失控。百姓不安，質疑你的治理，爭相離去。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Wuhuan barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
PikaMan: 烏桓部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: 與漢人的文化衝突導致了匈奴部落的失控。百姓不安，質疑你的治理，爭相離去。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Xiongnu barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
PikaMan: 匈奴部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: 獲得軍事增益，但也會惡化與其他勢力的關係。
English: Gain military benefits at the expense of the relations with other factions.

Text: [[b]]宮廷[[/b]]乃是由位居官府要位的人物組成，他們對於您的勢力有深遠的影響。
English: The [[b]]court[[/b]] consists of characters in special government posts that have important effects on your faction.
Vanilla: [[b]]宮廷[[/b]]乃是由位居官府要位的人物組成，他們對於您的勢力有深遠的影響。

Text: [[b]]行政官員[[/b]]是您官府體制中的一個職位。行政官員負責監督一郡的地方官府，同時為其領土提供特定的加成。
English: [[b]]Administrator[[/b]] is a position within your government. An administrator oversees the local government in a commandery and provides certain bonuses to these lands.
Vanilla: [[b]]行政官員[[/b]]是您官府體制中的一個職位。行政官員負責監督一郡的地方官府，同時為其領土提供特定的加成。

Text: [[b]]駐防軍隊[[/b]]是駐紮在城鎮中的軍隊，城鎮遭遇攻擊時，他們會與當地駐軍一同作戰。
English: [[b]]Garrisoned armies[[/b]] are armies stationed in a settlement. These will be defending the city in case of an attack and join the local garrison.
Vanilla: [[b]]駐防軍隊[[/b]]是駐紮在城鎮中的軍隊，城鎮遭遇攻擊時，他們會與當地駐軍一同作戰。

Text: 可透過[[b]]戰鬥勝利[[/b]]，以及對[[b]]敵軍[[/b]]造成比我軍更嚴重的[[b]]傷亡[[/b]]，來提升[[b]]堅韌度[[/b]]。
English: Increase your [[b]]fortitude[[/b]] through [[b]]winning battles[[/b]], and by inflicting greater [[b]]casualties[[/b]] upon [[b]]enemy forces[[/b]] than they inflict upon yours.
Vanilla: 可透過[[b]]戰鬥勝利[[/b]]，以及對[[b]]敵軍[[/b]]造成比我軍更嚴重的[[b]]傷亡[[/b]]，來提升[[b]]堅韌度[[/b]]。

Text: 這些[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]或來自敵軍屍首、或因功獲賞而得，兩者都是此勢力[[b]]積極作戰[[/b]]的回報。
English: Whether from the bodies of fallen enemies, or awarded for gallant behaviour, these [[b]]trophies[[/b]] reward an [[b]]aggressive approach[[/b]] to this faction.
Vanilla: 這些[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]或來自敵軍屍首、或因功獲賞而得，兩者都是此勢力[[b]]積極作戰[[/b]]的回報。

Text: [[b]]戰利品[[/b]]可以陳放於[[b]]戰利品櫃[[/b]]內。每一個陳放的[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]都會提供加成效果。
English: [[b]]Trophies[[/b]] can be displayed in the [[b]]trophy cabinet[[/b]]. Each [[b]]trophy[[/b]] provides a bonus whilst it is on display.
Vanilla: [[b]]戰利品[[/b]]可以陳放於[[b]]戰利品櫃[[/b]]內。每一個陳放的[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]都會提供加成效果。

English: The finer your horses, the more powerful your cavalry will be.

Text: 採取[[b]]紮營[[/b]]姿態的軍隊可以建造更長期的營地。\\n\\n建立更大的城鎮需要耗費[[b]]糧食[[/b]]。
English: [[b]]Encamp[[/b]] is a stance for armies that allow them to set up a more permanent camp.\\n\\n[[b]]Food[[/b]] is used to establish bigger settlements.
Vanilla: 採取[[b]]紮營[[/b]]姿態的軍隊可以建造更長期的營地。\\n\\n建立更大的城鎮需要耗費[[b]]糧食[[/b]]。

Text: [[b]]軍事物資補給[[/b]]讓軍隊得以維持作戰能力，且會對[[b]]補員[[/b]]和[[b]]士氣[[/b]]造成影響。
English: [[b]]Military supplies[[/b]] allow an army to stay in fighting condition and will have an impact on [[b]]replenishment[[/b]] and [[b]]morale[[/b]].
Vanilla: [[b]]軍事物資補給[[/b]]讓軍隊得以維持作戰能力，且會對[[b]]補員[[/b]]和[[b]]士氣[[/b]]造成影響。

Text: 黑山匪徒之數與日俱增，其行為亦更加肆無忌憚。
English: As the Black Mountain bandits increase in number, the more brazen they become.
MappedByText: 黑山匪徒之數與日俱增，其行為亦更加肆無忌憚。

Text: [[b]]黃巾軍[[/b]]勢力被官府視為亂賊，因此一般來說和他們進行外交談判會受到[[b]]重重限制[[/b]]。張燕可以[[b]]增進與黃巾軍的關係[[/b]]，並與他們密切合作。
English: [[b]]Yellow Turban[[/b]] factions are seen as outlaws and diplomacy with them is normally [[b]]restricted[[/b]]. Zhang Yan can [[b]]improve relations[[/b]] with Yellow Turbans and can align himself with them.
Vanilla: [[b]]黃巾軍[[/b]]勢力被官府視為亂賊，因此一般來說和他們進行外交談判會受到[[b]]重重限制[[/b]]。張燕可以[[b]]增進與黃巾軍的關係[[/b]]，並與他們密切合作。

Text: 在[[b]]伏擊戰[[/b]]中，縱列行軍的守方兩翼大開，攻方得以任意選擇出擊的最佳時機。
English: In an [[b]]ambush[[/b]], the defending force is attacked from both sides while marching in column, leaving the attacker to choose the best time to strike.
Vanilla: 在[[b]]伏擊戰[[/b]]中，縱列行軍的守方兩翼大開，攻方得以任意選擇出擊的最佳時機。

Text: [[b]]董氏[[/b]]\\n郿侯夫人\\n\\n將領類型：{{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]董卓髮妻，卓封郿侯。不僅生性貪婪，且行事作風十分謹慎狡猾。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Dong Peishan[[/b]]\\nEmpress Dong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Dong Peishan is greedy, but ever cautious in her conduct. If it’s Dong Zhou you’re after, you must outwit the cunning Dong Peishan first"[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Wu Anguo[[/b]]\\nOne Armed Bear\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_wood}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Although he lost one hand, he was one of the few who survived from duel with Lubu.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]閻象[[/b]]\\n賢達哲士\\n\\n將領類型：{{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]閻象深圖遠慮，總是危機到來之前就做好了準備。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Yan Xiang[[/b]]\\nSagacious Seer\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Blessed with prodigious foresight, Yan Xiang sees and reacts to the perils and pitfalls long before they arise.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]張勳[[/b]]\\n開國將軍\\n\\n將領類型：{{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]仲氏大將軍張勳號令三軍誰敢不從？[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Zhang Xun[[/b]]\\nGeneral-in-Chief of Zhong\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]As the lead general in the Zhong Kingdom, Zhang Xun commanded the formidable army of the Yuan family.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Chen Deng[[/b]]\\nMan For All Seasons\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Sometimes, just sometimes, power fails to corrupt, and instead leads to altruism and charity.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Lady Cai[[/b]]\\nThe Lady of Jingzhou\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_water}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]The house of Cai is the most famous noble family in Jingzhou. Lady Cai is willing to use the power.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]劉氏[[/b]]\\n忌害美婦\\n\\n將領類型：{{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]「袁尚母劉氏之妒，其酷烈也甚矣。乃城破之後，不能死節，而獻甄氏於曹丕，以圖苟全，又何其無烈性至此乎！可見婦之貞者必不妒，婦之妒者必不貞。」[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Lady Liu[[/b]]\\nDevoted Mother\\n\\nGeneral type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lady Liu constantly worries about her family. Perhaps she worries too much.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]忠於漢室[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]求勝之道[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:red]]需要高威望來稱帝[[/col]]\\n如獲皇帝寵信則可獲得威望\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]對漢室和皇帝的尊重和忠誠，馴服了野心。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Loyalty to the Han[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Path to victory[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:red]]Requires high prestige for creating an emperor seat[[/col]]\\nCan gain prestige with imperial favours\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Ambition is tamed by respect and loyalty towards the Han and its emperors.[[/col]][[/i]]
MappedByText: [[b]]忠於漢室[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]求勝之道[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:red]]需要高威望來稱帝[[/col]]\\n如獲皇帝寵信則可獲得威望\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]對漢室和皇帝的尊重和忠誠，馴服了野心。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]傭兵序列[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]附加建築[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]可以招募傭兵[[/col]]\\n[[col:green]]提升[[/col]]商業產值\\n[[col:green]]增加[[/col]]補員\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]若不考慮權勢傳承，金錢最大的用途便是擴充兵力，如此一來勇士才能無牽無掛爲天下效命[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Mercenary Outpost[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Add-on building[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]Grants access to Mercenaries[[/col]]\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Income from commerce\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Replenishment\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Without inheriting authority, wealth's greatest use is for attaining power, so the brave can serve China regardless of their heritage.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]游擊戰[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]軍事建築系列[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] 戰鬥後擄掠收入\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] 軍事物資補給\\n\\n[[col:flavour]]於外邦領土時的補員速率\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]敵強我弱時，務必保持靈活，利用計謀與奇襲致勝。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Guerilla Warfare[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Military building chain[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Post-battle loot income\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Military supplies\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Replenishment in foreign land\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]When fighting a greater opponent, remain flexible and use cunning and surprise.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]親善羌人部落[[/b]]\\n\\n [[col:flavour]][[i]]此派系親善羌人。羌人不會對此派系造成負面影響。 [[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]士族[[/b]]\\n\\n [[col:flavour]][[i]]具強大影響力的地方豪強。他們可能對你有所助益或傷害。 [[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Local Nobles[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Add-on building[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Available Local Noble units \\n [[col:green]]+[[/col]] Replenishment \\n [[col:red]]+[[/col]] Corruption \\n\\n [[col:flavour]][[i]]The local elites. They can be helpful or harmful to you.[[/col]][[/i]]
PikaMan: [[b]]地方豪強[[/b]]\\n\\n [[col:flavour]][[i]]具強大影響力的地方世族。他們可能對你有所助益或傷害。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]伯長部曲[[/b]]\\n\\n袁紹可以委任帶領着不同兵種部隊的低階校尉或伯長，而不是英雄猛將。\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]伯長與手下平起平坐，會毫不猶豫地服從命令。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Captain Retinues[[/b]]\\n\\nInstead of heroic characters, House of Yuan can employ lower-ranked officers and captains who lead retinues of various unit compositions.\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Leading their men as first amongst equals, captains will follow your orders without hesitation.[[/col]][[/i]]
PikaMan: [[b]]校尉部曲[[/b]]\\n\\n袁紹能夠不採用英雄人物，而是以低階軍官與校尉領軍，他們會帶領一群由各種單位組成的部曲。\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]校尉是以與兵卒平等的地位在前方領軍，他們會毫不猶豫地聽從您的命令。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]駿馬[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]經濟差事[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]提升[[/col]] 貿易產值\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]你的隨從會將你所養的馬匹以高價賣出。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Sell Horses[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Economic assignment[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Income from commerce\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Your attendant will sell the horses you've bred, for a fine sum.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: 泥地會使所有部隊的移動與戰鬥效率低下。
English: Mud makes the movement and combat of all units inefficient.
MappedByText: 泥地會使所有部隊的移動與戰鬥效率低下。

Text: 皇家祭祀儀式圓滿完成，天子對到場的貴族示恩。
English: The imperial ancestral rite was completed successfully, and the emperor shows favour to the attending nobles.
MappedByText: 皇家祭祀儀式圓滿完成，天子對到場的貴族示恩。

Text: 皇家祭祀儀式圓滿完成，天子對到場的貴族示恩。
English: The imperial ancestral rite was completed successfully, and the emperor shows favour to the attending nobles.
MappedByText: 皇家祭祀儀式圓滿完成，天子對到場的貴族示恩。

Text: 皇家祭祀儀式順利完成，但天子一言不發便回宮了。
English: The imperial ancestral rite ended without incident. Unfortunately, the emperor returned to the place without acknowledging your contribution.
MappedByText: 皇家祭祀儀式順利完成，但天子一言不發便回宮了。

Text: 陰謀！有人於宴會中欲加害於你。事雖未成，但刺客已被护卫弑杀，無法得知是誰在背後主謀。
English: A cowardly conspiracy! There was a failed attempt to assassinate you during the banquet. Unfortunately, the assaliant was slain by the guards before he could be made to reveal the conspirator's identity.
MappedByText: 陰謀！有人於宴會中欲加害於你。事雖未成，但刺客已被护卫弑杀，無法得知是誰在背後主謀。

Text: 幸運的是，宴會中沒發生什麼大事。
English: Fortunately, nothing of note happened during the banquet.
MappedByText: 幸運的是，宴會中沒發生什麼大事。

Text: 天子對你甚有好感，决定給你一些賞賜，來表彰你對朝廷的貢獻。
English: The emperor thinks highly of you. His majesty has decided to gift you a small fortune in honour of your contributions to the state.
MappedByText: 天子對你甚有好感，决定給你一些賞賜，來表彰你對朝廷的貢獻。

Text: 誹謗！一個敵對的軍閥在朝廷散佈惡意的謠言，使獻帝懷疑我們對大漢的忠誠。
English: Slander! A rival warlord is spreading malicious rumours at the imperial court, causing Emperor Xian to doubt our loyalty to the Han.
MappedByText: 誹謗！一個敵對的軍閥在朝廷散佈惡意的謠言，使獻帝懷疑我們對大漢的忠誠。

Text: 也許是出於欽佩，也許是向您示好，有一勢力在皇帝面前爲你多加褒詞。最近在宮中人人都在談論您的功績。
English: Perhaps out of admiration or to curry favour, a faction has put in a good word for you with the emperor. Talk of your exploits is is all that is on everyone's lips at the palace of late.
MappedByText: 也許是出於欽佩，也許是向您示好，有一勢力在皇帝面前爲你多加褒詞。最近在宮中人人都在談論您的功績。

Text: 荀彧進言，指責你專權跋扈，不以輔佐漢室為重。\n\n您很憤怒，但又不能公開表達，因為你們結交已久，他是你一位心腹。
English: Xun Yu openly criticized you for seeking power, saying you should be focusing on the restoration of Han dynasty. He even had the gall to say that because of your pursuit of power, you will never see a good end. \\n\\n You were furious, but you could not openly express it, since he was an old friend and a loyal servant.
MappedByText: 荀彧進言，指責你專權跋扈，不以輔佐漢室為重。\n\n您很憤怒，但又不能公開表達，因為你們結交已久，他是你一位心腹。

Text: 荀彧年少即以王佐之才出名。他曾從事於袁紹，但覺得袁紹不能成大事，於是投奔於你。你和他交談後非常高興，說他是你的子房。
English: Xun Yu, a renowned strategist, has come to you to offer you his service. Many lords have offered him to join their side, but he rejected all the offers and decided to be a part of your ambition. You were thrilled to accept that someone so talented had come to you.
MappedByText: 荀彧年少即以王佐之才出名。他曾從事於袁紹，但覺得袁紹不能成大事，於是投奔於你。你和他交談後非常高興，說他是你的子房。

Text: 董卓被殺，蔡邕傷感其遇，被王允知悉，而出兵捉拿蔡邕並下令處死。\\n\\n 王允曰：「昔武帝不殺司馬遷，使作謗書，流於後世。方今國祚中衰，戎馬在郊，不可令佞臣執筆在幼主左右，後令吾徒並受謗議。」
English: After Dong Zhou's death at the hands of his adopted son Lu Bu, it was observed that the notable scholar Cai Yong mourned his passing. Upon hearing this, Wang Yun ordered troops to capture him and for his execution. "Cai Yong mourned as the tyrant lie dead! It's clear his loyalty lied with Dong Zhou! Treason!" exclaimed Wang Yun, madness in his eyes.\\n

Text: 我方活躍於交州的細作稟報最近一位趙姓婦人以人民的名義率兵起義對抗交州軍隊，並將其擊敗。據說此人奪取了城池並自成一派。時間會告訴你是否得到一個盟友，還是一個敵人。
English: Recently, there have been reports of a Wu army having been defeated. The rumor is that a Nam Viet woman named Lady Trieu led the forces against Wu. This news has spread like wildfire throughout China and become the topic of much deliberation between scholars and commonfolk alike. Time will tell whether you have gained a strong ally or perhaps a dangerous enemy.

Text: 袁劉兩家開戰，呂布爲了自己的利益決定嘗試促使雙方講和。於是呂布設下酒席並邀請雙方赴宴。呂布告訴雙方的將領他厭惡爭鬥。交戰的雙方一方是他的親家，一方他的賢弟，如果雙方要爭鬥那不如依照天意，如果他能射中營中一百五十步外戟上的小支，那雙方就立馬停戰。袁劉雙方出於對呂布的尊重接受了提議，並在驚歎中目睹了箭矢穿過了一百五十步外戟上的小支。
English: Tensions have risen too high and war has been declared between Yuan Shu and Liu Bei. Lü Bu, being opposed to this war for one reason or another, invites the enemy generals to a feast at his camp. Lü Bu tells them he believes their war is not truly Heaven’s will and suggests they test it. If he can hit his halberd’s plume from one hundred fifty paces with an arrow, peace must be made. Keen to stay in Lü Bu’s good graces, both sides agree. To the onlookers’ amazement, Lü Bu’s arrow slices the plume free! The Warrior Without Equal, indeed!

Text: 蔡琰的丈夫世後，蔡琰與她的父親蔡邕都決定返回故居洛陽。
English: When Cai Yan's husband Wei Zhongdao died, Cai Yan decided to return to Luoyang, where her father Cai Yong had served brilliantly for many years. Now, Cai Yan's musical skill and intellect would shine brightly there as well.

Text: 你帳下的一位的女士昨晚做了一個胎夢。一位謀士說道：「主公，昨晚見雙尾彗星，此夢吉兆也。」
English: One lady in our faction dreams of the birth of her beautiful child last night.\\n\\n\\n\\n "My Lord, I saw a twin-tailed comet last night as well. The dream may prove true."\\n

Text: 匈奴入侵，凡經過之處皆寸草不生。亂軍之中一名軍士來報：蔡邕的女兒，蔡文姬，被匈奴人俘走了。
English: A surprise invasion is launched by the Xiongnu and your city is devastated. Many are wounded or captured during the assault. One of your military advisors informs you that Cai Yong's daughter, the last of his line, Cai Yan is among those captured by the barbarians. The Xiongnu chanyu Liu Bao has taken her and all the others back north with his horde.

Text: 你聽軍士講述常山趙子龍救黃忠、拒漢水之事，你稱子龍“一身是膽”，並號其爲虎威將軍，大勞將士，歡宴至晚。
English: Over the years, Zhao Yun has served dependably and become well-known for his courage, honor, and supreme martial skill. To reward him, you hold a ceremony with all your generals and advisors in attendance.\\n\\n “You have served me well, Zilong, and for this service, I bestow upon you the title of General of Tiger’s Might, rank of Tiger General, and this finely crafted armor.”

Text: 黃巾匪徒已被擊潰。青州生還者們願意報德。曹操將之收於旗下，名爲青州軍。
English: The yellow turban warband is crushed. Hailing from Qingzhou, the survivors offer their servitude. Cao Cao gathers them under his banner and dubs them Qingzhou Troops.
MappedByText: 黃巾匪徒已被擊潰。青州生還者們願意報德。曹操將之收於旗下，名爲青州軍。

Text: 所有的經濟活動都因爲新幣的鑄造而受到阻礙。我們別無選擇，只能等待商人們適應新的標準。
English: All economic activities have been hampered by the minting of a new coin. We have no choice but to wait for merchants to adjust to the new standard.
MappedByText: 所有的經濟活動都因爲新幣的鑄造而受到阻礙。我們別無選擇，只能等待商人們適應新的標準。

Text: 由於新幣發行，買糧時出現問題。我們別無選擇，只能等到農民們適應新的標準。
English: We've run into problems purchasing grain with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for farmers to adjust to the new standard.
MappedByText: 由於新幣發行，買糧時出現問題。我們別無選擇，只能等到農民們適應新的標準。

Text: 由於新幣發行，分發軍餉時出現問題。我們別無選擇，只能等到士兵們適應新的標準。
English: We've run into problems paying the troops with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for soldiers to adjust to the new standard.
MappedByText: 由於新幣發行，分發軍餉時出現問題。我們別無選擇，只能等到士兵們適應新的標準。

Text: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可使你執掌一隻特殊軍隊。
English: This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.
MappedByText: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可使你執掌一隻特殊軍隊。

Text: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可使你執掌一隻特殊軍隊。
English: This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.
MappedByText: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可使你執掌一隻特殊軍隊。

Text: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可使你執掌一隻特殊軍隊。
English: This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.
MappedByText: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可使你執掌一隻特殊軍隊。

Text: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可使你執掌一隻特殊軍隊。
English: This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.
MappedByText: 亂世出豪傑。新進的一名隨從可使你執掌一隻特殊軍隊。

Text: 與漢人的文化衝突導致了羌人部落的失控。百姓不安，質疑你的治理，爭相離去。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Qiang barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
PikaMan: 羌人部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: 與漢人的文化衝突導致了烏桓部落的失控。百姓不安，質疑你的治理，爭相離去。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Shanyue barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
PikaMan: 山越部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: 酣戰之後，您殺死了巨型白虎。然而出乎意料的是，其它老虎俯伏在您身前，好像屈服於您的力量！這些白虎似乎不是普通的野獸。
English: After an epic struggle, you slay the enormous white tiger. Then, unexpectedly, the other tigers prostrate themselves as if submitting to your might! These white tigers don't seem to be ordinary beasts.
MappedByText: 酣戰之後，您殺死了巨型白虎。然而出乎意料的是，其它老虎俯伏在您身前，好像屈服於您的力量！這些白虎似乎不是普通的野獸。

Text: 您放棄了狩獵，回去了。然而不知爲何，怪獸從此不再攻擊。
English: You give up the hunt and return. However, for reasons unknown, the monster attacks stopped.
MappedByText: 您放棄了狩獵，回去了。然而不知爲何，怪獸從此不再攻擊。

Text: 與漢人的文化衝突導致了烏桓部落的失控。百姓不安，質疑你的治理，爭相離去。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Wuhuan barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
PikaMan: 烏桓部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: 與漢人的文化衝突導致了匈奴部落的失控。百姓不安，質疑你的治理，爭相離去。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Xiongnu barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
PikaMan: 匈奴部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: 諸葛亮精心設計出一種新武器。這是一種能夠同時射出多枚箭矢的弩弓，可以壓制敵人。
English: Zhuge Liang has brilliantly engineered a new weapon. It is a crossbow that fires several bolts simultaneously to overwhelm the enemy.
MappedByText: 諸葛亮精心設計出一種新武器。這是一種能夠同時射出多枚箭矢的弩弓，可以壓制敵人。

Text: 匈奴入侵，凡經過之處皆寸草不生。亂軍之中當代大儒蔡邕之女蔡文姬，被匈奴人俘走了。如不在下個季度之前交付贖金，蔡文姬將被左賢王帶回北方。
English: After a surprise raid on Luoyang by the Xiongnu, Cai Yong’s only daughter, Cai Yan, was captured and taken back to their camp. At last, the Xiongnu chanyu revealed his demands for her release. The ransom is considerable and the window of opportunity is short. If the price isn’t paid in the next season, she will be taken North, and the bright Cai Yan may be lost forever.

Your messengers report a remarkable story. A trader spotted a Han woman living amongst the Xiongnu and identified her as Cai Yan, the daughter of the grand scholar Cai Yong. It seems she was forced to marry a chieftain of the Xiongnu. Perhaps someone could convince this chieftain to free Cai Yan. One of your scouts has already left to investigate...

Your messengers report a remarkable story. A trader spotted a Han woman living amongst the Xiongnu and identified her as Cai Yan, the daughter of the grand scholar Cai Yong. It seems she was forced to marry a chieftain of the Xiongnu. Perhaps someone could convince this chieftain to free Cai Yan. One of your scouts has already left to investigate...

Text: 曾比肩袁曹，現卻成日飲酒作樂，荒廢才能。不料淳于瓊在危難之際卻懸崖勒馬，重振其西園校尉之威。
English: The drink has ruined many a good man, but Chunyu Qiong will not be amongst them. The former Colonel of the Emperor’s Army has sworn off alcohol and is a drunkard no more. With a clear mind and a wealth of experience, Chunyu Qiong is, once again, that mighty colonel that led the Imperial Army, equal to Cao Cao and Yuan Shao.

Text: 您獲得一張可指揮丹陽部隊的兵符。
English: You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Danyang troops.
MappedByText: 您獲得一張可指揮丹陽部隊的兵符。

Text: 由於您對學者和人才的贊助，您的官員在修爲的道路上取得了進步。
English: Thanks to your patronage of scholars and men of talent, your officers have made progress on the path to enlightenment.
MappedByText: 由於您對學者和人才的贊助，您的官員在修爲的道路上取得了進步。

Text: 我們從附近游牧民族召集戰士，組成了一支强健騎兵。這些令人可畏的鐵甲騎兵將衝垮你的敵人。
English: We have gathered warriors from nearby nomadic peoples to form a powerful cavalry unit. These formidable cataphracts will crush your enemies.
MappedByText: 我們從附近游牧民族召集戰士，組成了一支强健騎兵。這些令人可畏的鐵甲騎兵將衝垮你的敵人。

Text: 您獲得一張可指揮荊楚部隊的兵符。
English: You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Jingchu troops.
MappedByText: 您獲得一張可指揮荊楚部隊的兵符。

Text: 自西域而來的粟特商人出現在我方境內。隨之而來的不僅僅有異域商品，還有僱傭粟特傭兵的機會。
English: Sogdians from the west has been spotted entering our borders. We will be able to purchase fine goods or hire Sogd mercenaries soon.
MappedByText: 自西域而來的粟特商人出現在我方境內。隨之而來的不僅僅有異域商品，還有僱傭粟特傭兵的機會。

Text: 一名西涼校尉加入您的勢力。
English: A Xiliang colonel has joined your faction.
MappedByText: 一名西涼校尉加入您的勢力。

Text: 黃巾烈火再次熊熊燃燒。漢朝覆滅之日不遠。我軍勢不可擋，昔日隱匿的教友也會再加入我們。天下大吉的夢想定會實現。
English: Once again the flames begin to burn. Now we are ready to destroy the Han dynasty. Our forces are strong, and the old comrades who had to live in hiding will also appear and respond to us. Let's make sure that Zhang Jue's unfulfilled dream come true.
MappedByText: 黃巾烈火再次熊熊燃燒。漢朝覆滅之日不遠。我軍勢不可擋，昔日隱匿的教友也會再加入我們。天下大吉的夢想定會實現。

Text: 鑒於您近期勢如破竹，北軍中候已宣誓效忠於您。他所指揮的精良軍隊也隨同前來，加入您麾下。
English: Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.
MappedByText: 鑒於您近期勢如破竹，北軍中候已宣誓效忠於您。他所指揮的精良軍隊也隨同前來，加入您麾下。

Text: 喜報！宗族已喜得千金，此女將正式成爲主公宗親，但同儕兄弟的勾心鬥角，怕是在所難免…
English: Joyous occasion! A daughter has been born! New blood keeps the line strong, but may also give rise to jealousy if other siblings feel their own position is threatened.

Text: 恭賀關將軍麟兒入拿，喜得貴子！此孩兒蘊藏的勇武英氣與其關將軍相比也不遑多讓。關將軍真有福氣！
English: A most joyous occasion! The mistress of Guan Yu gives birth to a son. He will definitely be a great general!

Text: 恭賀關將軍明珠入拿，喜得千金！此孩兒雖爲女兒身，其蘊藏的勇武英氣與其兄相比卻也不遑多讓。關將軍真有福氣！
English: A most joyous occasion! The mistress of Guan Yu gives birth to a daughter. The child the spitting image of her father, She may become a heroine.

Text: 恭賀主公麟兒入拿，喜得貴子！此孩兒蘊藏的勇武英氣與其主公相比也不遑多讓。主公真有福氣！
English: A most joyous occasion! The mistress of Liu Bei gives birth to a son. He has pure and mischievous eyes.

Text: 喜報！宗族已喜得貴子，此子將正式成爲主公宗親，但同儕兄弟的勾心鬥角，怕是在所難免…
English: Joyous occasion - A son has been born! New blood keeps the line strong, but may also give rise to jealousy if other siblings feel their own position is threatened.

Text: 恭賀張將軍麟兒入拿，喜得貴子！此孩兒蘊藏的勇武英氣與其關將軍相比也不遑多讓。張將軍真有福氣！
English: A most joyous occasion! The mistress of Zhang Fei gives birth to a son. He will definitely be a great general!

Text: 恭賀張將軍明珠入拿，喜得千金！此孩兒雖爲女兒身，其蘊藏的勇武英氣與其兄相比卻也不遑多讓。張將軍真有福氣！
English: A most joyous occasion! The mistress of Zhang Fei gives birth to a daughter. The child the spitting image of her father, She may become a heroine.

Text: 隨着喬公將兩位女兒許給了孫策與周瑜，二喬的美貌與風雅名揚江東。
English: With marriaged arranged by their father, Da Qiao and Xiao Qiao moved to their new home in Jingdong. Now, everyone there knows the beauty and artistic talent of the Qiao sisters. The men who have the sisters will have nothing to fear nor desire.

Text: 皖城喬公有兩個女兒，皆國色也。喬公聞孫策與周瑜的大名，特來將兩位女兒許配給兩位將軍。
English: The Elder Qiao of the Han Dynasty has two daughters, both of them fames for their beauty and artistic talents. The two daughters, Da Qiao and Xiao Qiao, will move to serve Sun Ce and Zhou Yu.\\n\\n“I deeply admir your prestige. I offer my daughters for marriage.”

Text: 才智過人，忠誠有加而又儀表堂堂的咒語，從少年時期就是孫策的密友了。兩人自幼形影不離，而且對互相的家族也十分敬重。周瑜的音樂才華無人能比，說明他既才華橫溢，又有禮有節。
English: Zhou Yu, also known as “Mei Zhou Long” for his striking appearance and loyalty, was befriended by Sun Ce at an early age. Young Zhou Yu once successfully persuaded Sun Ce and Lady Wu to move closer and become neighbors. Now, with war raging throughout the Han Empire, it’s time for Zhou Yu to join Sun Ce.

Text: 野心勃勃的土，崩二人開始了對你的反叛，她們想奪取王位，取你首級！
English: “Lord! My Lord!\\n\\n A soldier rushed forward and reported that a hefty quantity of our supplies had been stolen. The bandits seem to have been displeased with our answer and have taken our supplies as payment instead.

Text: 皇家宴會結束，並無意外發生
MappedByText: 皇家宴會結束，並無意外發生

English: Imperial Favour: A Gift from the Emperor
The Return of the Trieu Dynasty
A Strong Daughter is Born to Zhang Fei
A Strong Daughter is Born to Guan Yu
A Precious Son is Born to Liu Bei
A Strong Son is Born to Zhang Fei
A Strong Son is Born to Guan Yu
They ran away with our supply! Bandit bitches!

Text: 有黃巾軍侵入主公領地，須從速討敵。
English: A yellow turban warband has invaded your territory. You must defeat them.
MappedByText: 有黃巾軍侵入主公領地，須從速討敵。

Text: 在此動蕩之秋，要想出人頭地就只有刀兵相見！贏得戰鬥便能向世人展現您的能力。
English: The path to prominence in these turbulent times is by the sword! Win battles to demonstrate your capability.
MappedByText: 在此動蕩之秋，要想出人頭地就只有刀兵相見！贏得戰鬥便能向世人展現您的能力。

Text: 興師十萬，日费千金。國用不足則不能平亂。掌控舉國之財，而後昭示天下。
English: Wars are a costly endeavour and one cannot hope to end this chaos without a sizable treasury. Show all under heaven that you possess China's wealth.
MappedByText: 興師十萬，日费千金。國用不足則不能平亂。掌控舉國之財，而後昭示天下。

Text: 要稱霸一方就要有正統的名義。若能建造一座萬人敬仰的皇城，便可彰顯實力，天下人必當歸順。
English: Cement your rule with legitimacy! Build an Imperial City that will be the envy of other warlords. All under heaven will look to you for leadership.
MappedByText: 要稱霸一方就要有正統的名義。若能建造一座萬人敬仰的皇城，便可彰顯實力，天下人必當歸順。

English: An inevitable rule to stabilize the turmoil.

Text: 養育大宛馬來裝備騎兵部隊。
English: Ferghana horses are bred to equip cavalry forces.
MappedByText: 養育大宛馬來裝備騎兵部隊。

Text: 黃巾之勢必將再次席捲天下。
English: The Yellow Turban is ready to color the world once again.
MappedByText: 黃巾之勢必將再次席捲天下。

Text: 黑山贼乘乱以增其之数。
English: Black Mountain bandits exploit the chaos to bolster their numbers.
MappedByText: 黑山贼乘乱以增其之数。

Text: 造成傷害較低，準確率也降低，但可壓制目標。
English: Inflicts less damage and has reduced accuracy but suppresses targets.
MappedByText: 造成傷害較低，準確率也降低，但可壓制目標。

Text: 火焰抗性：％d %% ||降低火焰造成的傷害數值。
English: Fire Resistance: %d%%||Damage of flaming attacks is reduced by this amount.
PikaMan: 火焰抵抗力：%d%%||降低火焰造成的傷害數值。

English: Pike Wall - Ji Guards of the Eight Talents

Text: 您的隨從會將您所養的馬匹以高價賣出。
English: Your attendant will sell the horses you've bred, for a fine sum.
MappedByText: 您的隨從會將您所養的馬匹以高價賣出。

Text: 您的隨從將在敵方領土支援您的軍隊。
English: Your attendant will support your army in enemy territory.
MappedByText: 您的隨從將在敵方領土支援您的軍隊。

Text: 您的隨從將協助擴張此城鎮。
English: Your attendant will help to expand the settlement.
MappedByText: 您的隨從將協助擴張此城鎮。

Text: 您的隨從將爲此地駐軍尋找新兵。
English: Your attendant will seek recruits for the local garrison.
MappedByText: 您的隨從將爲此地駐軍尋找新兵。

Text: 您的隨從將去募集兵員。
English: Your attendant will assemble volunteers for military service.
MappedByText: 您的隨從將去募集兵員。

Text: 您的隨從將管理宮廷事務，精簡政務。
English: Your attendant will manage court affairs, streamlining bureaucracy.
MappedByText: 您的隨從將管理宮廷事務，精簡政務。

Text: 您的侍中會親自管理郡內所有土木興建，確保所有工程皆以最高效率進行。
English: Your attendant will personally manage all construction projects within the commandery, ensuring that any building endeavours are carried out with maximum efficiency.
Vanilla: 您的侍中會親自管理郡內所有土木興建，確保所有工程皆以最高效率進行。

Text: 您的侍中會販賣多餘存糧，以振興當地市場。
English: Your attendant will stimulate local markets by selling reserve surplus.
Vanilla: 您的侍中會販賣多餘存糧，以振興當地市場。

Text: 北軍老練長槍鐵甲騎兵
MappedByPattern: 北軍老練長槍鐵甲騎兵

Text: 一旦有一支太守勢力的領袖獲得足以稱王的威望，群雄中最強的三家便會稱帝，使其都城成為握有龐大權力的皇城。太守勢力無法自行稱帝，但可以透過佔領這些皇城來證明自己的影響力，進而登基為帝。\\n\\n[[b]]勝利條件[[/b]]：奪佔所有皇城並擁有{{tr:victory_condition_regions_count}}個{{tr:map_regions}}，即能一統天下。
English: Once a governor faction leader has earned enough prestige to be named king, the three strongest warlords will proclaim themselves emperor, which will make their capitals seats of great power.\\n\\n[[b]]Victory condition[[/b]]: Unite China by bringing all emperor seats under your control and by owning {{tr:victory_condition_regions_count}} {{tr:map_regions}}.
MappedByText: 一旦有一支太守勢力的領袖獲得足以稱王的威望，群雄中最強的三家便會稱帝，使其都城成為握有龐大權力的皇城。太守勢力無法自行稱帝，但可以透過佔領這些皇城來證明自己的影響力，進而登基為帝。\\n\\n[[b]]勝利條件[[/b]]：奪佔所有皇城並擁有{{tr:victory_condition_regions_count}}個{{tr:map_regions}}，即能一統天下。

Text: 一旦有一支太守勢力的領袖獲得足以稱王的威望，群雄中最強的三家便會稱帝，使其都城成為握有龐大權力的皇城。\\n\\n[[b]]勝利條件[[/b]]\\n奪佔所有皇城，即能一統天下。\\n\\n[[b]]勝利類型：[[/b]]\\n標準：稱帝，並透過奪取其他稱帝者的皇城，消滅其他所有稱帝者。\\n\\n合作：可以簽訂同享天命的外交條約來集結力量。\\n\\n對決戰役：消滅對方玩家，或是與其他玩家角逐，成為第一位達成勝利條件的玩家。
English: Once a governor faction leader has earned enough prestige to be named king, the three strongest warlords will proclaim themselves emperor, which will make their capitals seats of great power.\\n\\n[[b]]Victory Condition[[/b]]\\nUnite China by bringing all emperor seats under your control.\\n\\n[[b]]Victory Types[[/b]]\\nStandard: become emperor and eliminate all other emperors by taking their seats of power.\\n\\nCo-operative: combine your strength by signing a shared mandate diplomatic deal.\\n\\nHead-to-Head: destroy the other player, or compete with one another to be the first to meet the victory conditions.
MappedByText: 一旦有一支太守勢力的領袖獲得足以稱王的威望，群雄中最強的三家便會稱帝，使其都城成為握有龐大權力的皇城。\\n\\n[[b]]勝利條件[[/b]]\\n奪佔所有皇城，即能一統天下。\\n\\n[[b]]勝利類型：[[/b]]\\n標準：稱帝，並透過奪取其他稱帝者的皇城，消滅其他所有稱帝者。\\n\\n合作：可以簽訂同享天命的外交條約來集結力量。\\n\\n對決戰役：消滅對方玩家，或是與其他玩家角逐，成為第一位達成勝利條件的玩家。

Text: 西涼精銳長槍鐵甲騎兵
MappedByPattern: 西涼精銳長槍鐵甲騎兵

Text: 此單位的武器可以穿透最强的護甲。
English: This unit's weapon allows it to pierce even the strongest enemy armour.
MappedByText: 此單位的武器可以穿透最强的護甲。

Text: 以如震天雷響與其火焰爆破震攝敵軍。
English: Thunderous sounds and exploding flames agitate the enemy.
PikaMan: 以如震天雷響與其火焰爆破震攝敵軍。

Text: 此弓威力非凡。射程雖短，但具穿甲威力。
English: Their heavy metal bows are short-ranged but can pierce through enemies.
PikaMan: 此弓威力非凡。射程雖短，但具穿甲威力。

Text: 當在近戰失利時，此部隊將引爆自身。
English: These fanatics will blow themselves up when they're in a losing battle.
PikaMan: 當在近戰失利時，此單位將引爆自身。

English: This unit's arrows spew clouds of deadly gas on impact.

Text: 他們可以在奔跑時進行射擊。
English: This unit can fire on the move.
PikaMan: 他們可以在奔跑時進行射擊。

Text: 特殊松香油箭，使目標更易焚燒。
English: This unit's sticky rosin arrows cling to their targets, making them vulnerable to flames.
PikaMan: 擊射特殊松香油箭，使目標更易焚燒。

Text: 此單位可對持盾敵人造成額外傷害。
English: This unit causes extra damage against shielded enemies.
Vanilla: 此單位可對持盾敵人造成額外傷害。

Text: 此單位可以直接攻擊城門，使您無需等待攻城塔或衝車的建造，便可發動攻城戰。
English: This unit can attack city gates, allowing you to instantly launch a siege battle without having to wait for towers or battering rams to be built.
MappedByText: 此單位可以直接攻擊城門，使您無需等待攻城塔或衝車的建造，便可發動攻城戰。

Text: 此單位配備遠程兵器，可以從遠處造成火勢。
English: This unit has a ranged weapon to light a fire from a distance.
MappedByText: 此單位配備遠程兵器，可以從遠處造成火勢。

Text: 此單位可對敵人進行挑釁。
MappedByText: 此單位可對敵人進行挑釁。
PikaMan: 他們可對敵人進行挑釁。

Text: 擊射響箭，驚嚇所經路徑上的敵軍。
English: This unit fires whistling arrows that demoralise enemies along their trajectory.
PikaMan: 擊射響箭，驚嚇所經路徑上的敵軍。

English: This unit can't shoot very far.

Text: 這些士兵只順從自己的喜好。他們在戰場上可能會恣意妄為，不聽命令自行進攻！
English: These soldiers obey only their own passions. They may charge without orders and act erratically on the battlefield!
Vanilla: 這些士兵只順從自己的喜好。他們在戰場上可能會恣意妄為，不聽命令自行進攻！
PikaMan: 有什麼使他們喪失理智。

Text: 超遠距，穿甲傷害高，射擊速率非常慢
English: Very Long Range, High Armour-Piercing Damage, Very Slow Reload
MappedByText: 超遠距，穿甲傷害高，射擊速率非常慢
